text: 7-Hydroxyamoxapine is an active metabolite of amoxapine (Asendin). It contributes to amoxapine's pharmacology. == See also == * Amoxapine == References == Category:Dibenzoxazepines Category:Piperazines Category:Tricyclic antidepressants Category:Chloroarenes Category:Hydroxyarenes Category:Human drug metabolites
title: 7-Hydroxyamoxapine
